description: The Lodge Long Sleeve Half Zip Sweater is the quintessential cold-weather style piece—inspired by icebreaker’s original merino wool pullover and decked out with a warm, chunky knit and classic ski style. The super-soft merino wool fibers provide natural breathability, odor resistance and softness, while the ribbed collar, cuffs and hem provide a smooth sweater-style finish. The half-zip design makes for quick temperature regulation and easy on and off. <br><br>Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Lodge LS Half Zip Sweater - Mens
